EmailTemplate.subject: Train to be a Sales Ambassador with NCS at Ignite 2015.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Sales Ambassador Training at Ignite 2015
Congratulations on graduating from the National Citizen Service programme and welcome to our fantastic alumni programme called The Challenge Society. Over the summer you expressed your interest in volunteering alongside our Sales Team as a Sales Ambassador in schools and colleges in your area.
Our first training event is taking place at our launch event for The Challenge Society called Ignite 2015!
Where: Goldsmiths University, New Cross, SE14 6NW. When: Saturday 28th of November between 11:00 and 17:00.
Click here to reserve your space!
Featuring special guests Aaron Roach Bridgeman from SBTV and a performance by Afrikan Boy!
In addition to becoming an official Sales Ambassador for The Challenge, Ignite 2015 is all about you and your future. Get involved in CV and interview workshops, personal statement sessions, money management workshops and meet a huge range of professionals!
Really looking forward to seeing you there,
Rhiannon Graduate Associate Manager - South East London
